questions.questionText: Which component is used to compile, debug and execute the java programs?
questions.explanation: JDK is a core component of Java Environment and provides all the tools, executables and binaries required to compile, debug and execute a Java Program.

questions.questionText: Which of these cannot be used for a variable name in Java?
questions.explanation: Keywords are specially reserved words that can not be used for naming a user-defined variable, for example: class, int, for, etc.

questions.questionText: Which one of the following is not a Java feature?
questions.explanation: Pointers is not a Java feature. Java provides an efficient abstraction layer for developing without using a pointer in Java. Features of Java Programming are Portable, Architectural Neutral, Object-Oriented, Robust, Secure, Dynamic and Extensible, etc.

questions.questionText: What is the extension of java code files?
Which environment variable is used to set the java path?
questions.explanation: JAVA_HOME is used to store a path to the java installation

questions.questionText: Which is NOT an access modifier?
questions.explanation: async is not used as an access modifier type in Java

questions.questionText: Which keyword allows us to share information between files in Java?
questions.explanation: the export keyword allows for the information to be transmitted between files

questions.questionText: Which of the following is not an OOPS concept in Java?
questions.explanation: There are 4 OOPS concepts in Java. Inheritance, Encapsulation, Polymorphism and Abstraction

questions.questionText: What is not the use of “this” keyword in Java?

options.text: Referring to the instance variable when a local variable has the same name
Passing itself to the method of the same class
Calling another constructor in constructor chaining

questions.explanation: “this” is an important keyword in java. It helps to distinguish between local variable and variables passed in the method as parameters.
